tourist_places.name: Futala Lake
tourist_places.description: Futala Lake is a popular hangout spot featuring a picturesque lake, colorful fountains, and vibrant evening atmosphere with food stalls and recreational activities.

tourist_places.name: Ambazari Lake
tourist_places.description: Ambazari Lake is a picturesque lake located in the heart of Nagpur. It offers boating facilities and a lovely promenade for leisurely walks.It has an garden also by the  side

tourist_places.name: Dragon Palace Temple
tourist_places.description: Dragon Palace Temple is a beautiful Buddhist temple known for its intricate architecture and serene surroundings.It's an important pilgrimage site for Buddhists.

tourist_places.name: Deekshabhoomi
tourist_places.description: Deekshabhoomi is a sacred monument where Dr. B. R. Ambedkar converted to Buddhism along with his followers. It's an important pilgrimage site for Buddhists.

tourist_places.name: Raman Science Centre
tourist_places.description: Raman Science Centre is an interactive science museum that offers hands-on exhibits, planetarium shows, and educational programs for visitors of all ages.

tourist_places.name: Seminary Hill
tourist_places.description: Seminary Hill offers panoramic views of Nagpur city. It's a great spot for a leisurely walk amidst lush greenery and historical landmarks. Beautiful place for bird watchers

tourist_places.name: Maharajbagh Zoo
tourist_places.description: Maharajbagh Zoo, also known as Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Zoological Park, is a popular zoo in Nagpur housing a variety of animals and birds.

tourist_places.name: Telankhedi Shiv Temple
tourist_places.description: Telankhedi Shiv Temple is an ancient temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, situated on the outskirts of Nagpur amidst natural surroundings.

tourist_places.name: Japanese Rose Garden
tourist_places.description: Japanese Rose Garden is a serene garden known for its beautiful rose varieties and peaceful ambiance, perfect for a relaxing stroll with family and loved ones.

tourist_places.name: Sri Poddareshwar Ram Mandir
tourist_places.description: Sri Poddareshwar Ram Mandir is a Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Rama, known for its intricate architecture and religious significance.

tourist_places.name: Krazy Castle Aqua Park
tourist_places.description: Krazy Castle Aqua Park is a fun-filled water park offering thrilling rides, slides, and water attractions for visitors of all ages.

tourist_places.name: Telankhedi Lake
tourist_places.description: Telankhedi Lake is a serene lake surrounded by lush greenery, offering a peaceful atmosphere for picnics and leisure activities.
